LanguageData.Mosquito.label: 모기
LanguageData.Corpse_Mosquito.label: 모기 시체
LanguageData.Mosquito.description: 모기es are small, parasitic, flies whose tube-like mouthparts (called a proboscis) pierce the hosts' skin to consume blood. This rimworld variety has adapted to be omnivorious, but prefers the succelent taste of fresh blood if possible. 모기es are known to carry and spread diseases.
LanguageData.Crashbug.label: 시체청소벌레
LanguageData.Crashbug.description: These fearsome, carnivorous beetle-bugs are small and hard to find, and they can often be fatal if one strikes. They attack by ramming or crashing into their target. This is what earned them their name of 시체청소벌레.
LanguageData.Fly.label: 파리
LanguageData.Fly.description: The small housefly has evolved on this rimworld to become a common and larger nuisance insect. Flies are known to carry and spread diseases.
LanguageData.Flea.label: 벼룩
LanguageData.Flea.description: 벼룩s are wingless insects with mouthparts adapted for piercing skin and sucking blood. 벼룩s are external parasites, living by hematophagy off the blood of mammals.
LanguageData.Cockroach.label: 바퀴벌레
LanguageData.Cockroach.description: 바퀴벌레es are omnivorous scavengers. They are attracted particularly to 고기s, starches, sugars, and fatty foods.
